org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.MAVLink.connection

Class MavLinkConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.droidplanner.services.android.impl.core.MAVLink.connection.MavLinkConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidMavLinkConnection, TcpConnection, UdpConnection

    public abstract class MavLinkConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Base for mavlink connection implementations.
